definition: only the official is allowed to light the fire/Gods may do what cattle may not/quod licet Iovi, non licet bovi
pinyin: zhi3 xu3 zhou1 guan1 fang4 huo3 , bu4 xu3 bai3 xing4 dian3 deng1
containing_words.word: 只許州官放火，不許百姓點燈

sentences.english: I forbid you to make a sortie today.
No retreat is allowed, only advance.
No hunting is allowed in the preserve.
It is required that nobody (should) smoke in the reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 按要求，誰都不許在閱覽室吸菸。

sentences.english: Drop the gun, and no funny stuff!
Counseling or interjecting personal opinion is never permitted.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯過程中不許摻雜譯者的個人觀點在內。

sentences.english: This exam will last 2 hours, no one is allowed to leave until the bell rings.
sentences.chinese: 考試時間爲兩個小時，打鈴之前不許出考場。

sentences.english: I have read a sentence in an essay:Even Yangjia are put to death, please don't use any contumelious words on him.
sentences.chinese: 即使楊佳被判死刑，也不許用侮辱性的字眼。

sentences.english: The C.O.s tell them that they can’t park there.
sentences.chinese: 獄警告訴他們，這裏不許停車。

sentences.english: I will not have this slave-girl's son sharing the inheritance with my son Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 我不許這女奴的兒子分享我兒以撒的繼承權。

sentences.english: The officer allowed no soldiers to take any excuse for not carrying out his orders.
sentences.chinese: 警官不許可兵士爲不執行他地號令找任何捏詞。

sentences.english: First of all , don ' t come in here without teacher .
sentences.chinese: 首先，不許在沒有老師的情況下進入這裏。

sentences.english: The seventh day also shall be most solemn and holy unto you: you shall do no servile work therein.
sentences.chinese: 到第七日再召開聖會，一切勞工都不許做。

sentences.english: No scampering or scurrying. Understand, Little Chef?
sentences.chinese: 不許上下亂竄，懂嗎，小廚子？

sentences.english: Generally, hearsay is not permissible evidence in court.
sentences.chinese: 通常，道聽塗說在法庭上不許作爲證據。

sentences.english: She allowed him to hold her hand, but forbade him any intimacies.
sentences.chinese: 她讓他握着手，但不許他有過份親密的行動。
